virtual void AbstractMenuAccessor::Back (  Menu *  menu  )  [pure virtual, inherited]
 

Implemented in MenuAccessor, and TextMenuAccessor.

virtual void AbstractMenuAccessor::Draw (  DeviceContext *  dc,
const Rect &  draw_rect,
BOOLEAN  highlighted
)  [pure virtual, inherited]
 

Draws the menu item.

Parameters:
dc Pointer to the device context for drawing.
draw_rect Rectangle which describes the area where to draw the menu item.
highlighted TRUE, if the menu item to be drawn is the currently selected one.

Implemented in MenuAccessor, and TextMenuAccessor.

virtual BOOLEAN AbstractMenuAccessor::First (   )  [pure virtual, inherited]
 

Sets the MenuAccessor to have access to the first menu item. This will not change the index of the selected item!

Returns:
FALSE, if there is no first menu item.

Implemented in ActionMenuAccessor, and TextMenuAccessor.

INT AbstractMenuAccessor::GetColumnCount (   )  const [virtual, inherited]
 

Returns:
Number of columns.

Reimplemented in MenuAccessor.

virtual XYDIM AbstractMenuAccessor::GetItemHeight (   )  const [pure virtual, inherited]
 

Returns:
Defines the height of all menu items.

Implemented in MenuAccessor, and TextMenuAccessor.

XYDIM AbstractMenuAccessor::GetItemWidth (   )  const [virtual, inherited]
 

Returns:
Defines the width of all menu items. -1 automatically sets the cell width depending on the number of columns.

void AbstractMenuAccessor::Init (   )  [inherited]
 

BOOLEAN AbstractMenuAccessor::IsEnabled (   )  [virtual, inherited]
 

Determines whether or not this menuAccessor can be triggered.

Returns:
TRUE.

Reimplemented in AbstractActionMenuAccessor.

BOOLEAN AbstractMenuAccessor::IsRoot (   )  [virtual, inherited]
 

Returns TRUE, if the current state of the menu-accessors represents a root-menu. Per default TRUE is returned.

Reimplemented in MenuAccessor.

virtual BOOLEAN AbstractMenuAccessor::Next (   )  [pure virtual, inherited]
 

Sets the MenuAccessor to the next menu item. This will not change the index of the selected item!

Returns:
FALSE, if there is no next menu item.

Implemented in ActionMenuAccessor, and TextMenuAccessor.

void AbstractMenuAccessor::OnActivate (  Menu *  menu,
AbstractMenuAccessor *  parent_accessor
)  [protected, virtual, inherited]
 

This method will be called every time the MenuAccessor will be activated (after changing a menu level).

Reimplemented in MenuAccessor.

void AbstractMenuAccessor::OnDeactivate (  Menu *  menu  )  [protected, virtual, inherited]
 

This method will be called every time the MenuAccessor will be deactivated (before changing a menu level).

Reimplemented in MenuAccessor.

void AbstractMenuAccessor::OnLanguageChanged (   )  [protected, virtual, inherited]
 

This method will be called every time the language changes. Overwrite this method to retranslate the text of the menu items.

Reimplemented in AbstractActionMenuAccessor, and MenuAccessor.
